Hello! I am a scout (No srsly. That's my rank) in troop 306!

You know, one of the things I hate about the interweb is the lack of tone. It's hard to convey sarcasm, and the difference between pointing something out and being negative is hard to find. Yeah, sure, we have these: ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):P:)![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif), but they can be annoying to use, especially in a serious post. 

I think that the "down with government" post was meant to be sarcastic, and I replied as such. On the other hand, I can see how it could be interpreted as serious.

I hope that we can move on from this minor post and get back to the OP. I've been really enjoying this thread, and I don't want it to be locked.

So, guys, please be the bigger man and move on. Please don't try to get the last word in.

Boy Scouts is like the Achievements mod IRL?

> 
> Boy Scouts is like the Achievements mod IRL?

Actually, now that you mention it - YES! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) And what is even cooler is that if you look at any American Boy Scout's merit badge sashes, no two are exactly alike. Scouts could work on merit badges that covered a variety of topics, everything from science related all the way to the fine arts. Sure, there are the required ones that every Scout had to earn in their quest for Eagle, but there was enough room for variation to keep it interesting.
